author: spencer_tb
content:
Our first release of the verkle test fixtures: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/eip6800%40v0.0.1
These will be our most basic transition tests. Filled with 0 stride set and using a small pre init mpt (based entirely on the start state of existing tests). Ideally all EL clients should pass these before we add more complex transition tests, i.e with stride enabled.

> 0 stride here means that we are keeping the MPT frozen. So the MPT is not being converted to the VKT within these tests.
> This is to keep the tests as simple as possible so we don't overcomplicate things before adding stride (when the MPT starts being converted on each block to VKT).
> So currently in these tests only blocks that are officially in the Verkle will update the VKT. Note an empty Verkle block will also write to the VKT (and change the state) due to the 2935 system contract.

If there are any issues running the test fixtures please send a message! ðŸ˜„ 
We plan to release genesis tests (starting at Prague/Verkle, no transition) next including tests for verkle specific EIPs.
